task.en: Help me create a note using the app Notes, titled Meeting Minutes. The body begins with "Agenda: Project Update".
task.zh: 帮我在备忘录软件中创建一个新的备忘录，标题叫Meeting Minutes。下面纯文本写“Agenda: Project Update”。
task.ar: ساعدني في إنشاء ملاحظة باستخدام تطبيق Notes، بعنوان Meeting Minutes. يبدأ النص بـ "Agenda: Project Update".
task.ja: アプリNotesを使用して、新しいメモをMeeting Minutesというタイトルで作成してください。本文は「Agenda: Project Update」から始めてください。
task.ru: Создайте заметку в приложении Notes с заголовком Meeting Minutes. Тело заметки начинается с "Agenda: Project Update".

pre_command: defaults write com.apple.Notes windowStateArchive -dict-add currentNoteContainerViewMode 0 && osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to make new note with properties {name:"Lorem Ipsum", body:"Dolor Sit Amet"}' && osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to delete every note' -e 'tell application "Notes" to delete every note in folder "Recently Deleted"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to quit'
grading_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' | grep -q "<h1>Meeting Minutes" && osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' | grep -q "<div>Agenda: Project Update" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' | grep -q "Meeting Minutes" && osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' | grep -q "Agenda: Project Update" && echo "True" || echo "False"
